title.en: A Prayer Recounting the Lives and Liberation of the Exalted Ḍākinī Mandāravā1

text.en: Emaho! Previously, in the aeon of the Illuminating King Bhāskara,
text.en-trans: emaho ngöntsé kalpa nangjé gyalpo ni

text.en: You were Pāṇḍarāvasinī, Clad in White—Iśvara’s divine daughter, .
text.en-trans: wangchuk lha yi semo gökarmo

text.en: Training on the path, you renounced saṃsāra and attained true awakening.
text.en-trans: lam jang khorwa pang né ngön sangye

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Later, in the aeon of All-Pervading Jewels2,
text.en-trans: dé ok kalpa rinchen dalwa na

text.en: You were born into the royal Brahmin class as Princess Nāṭyeśvarī, Lady of Dance.
text.en-trans: dramzé gyalrik semo gar wang trul

text.en: You established the kingdom of Sūryagarbha in the Dharma.
text.en-trans: nyimé nyingpö gyalsi chö la kö

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: In the bright eon of Kanakamuni,
text.en-trans: kalpa drönmé sertub tenpa la

text.en: Blessed by the buddhas of past, present and future,
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwa nam kyi jinlab né

text.en: You manifested five embodiments to tame beings on all five continents.
text.en-trans: ku ngé rangzhin duljé ling ngar trö

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Taking birth as the Princess Maheśvara and consort,
text.en-trans: wangchen yabyum semor ku trung né

text.en: You were called Adorning Light3.
text.en-trans: özer nang gyen zhé gyur gyagar gyi

text.en: The Indian kingdom of Kaṇika was established in the Dharma.
text.en-trans: ka ni ka yi yul kham chö la kö

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Blessed by the Āryas, in the dark land of Ḍāmaru,
text.en-trans: pakpé jinlab mün ling da ma rur

text.en: You manifested from a lotus and summoned Hayagrīva.
text.en-trans: pema kyé trul tamdrin drok su kuk

text.en: Through peaceful and wrathful means, the kingdom became virtuous.
text.en-trans: zhi dang drakpö gyalkham karpor gyur

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: In the abode of the god Indra, in Kaṅkari,
text.en-trans: lha yul gyajin né su kam ka ri

text.en: You were the mother of Sacred White Zenith4and you tamed the asura hordes.
text.en-trans: dampa tok kar mar gyur lhamin pungtsok tul

text.en: You were famed as The Vanquisher, as the god realms entered the Buddhist path.
text.en-trans: yul jom zhé drak lha kham sangye gyur

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: In the lower world, on the peak of a mountain of jewels,
text.en-trans: okchok riwo norbü tsemo ru

text.en: You emanated as a nāginī to dispel disease among the nāgas.
text.en-trans: lumor trul té lu yi né kün sal

text.en: Known then as Dharmendrā, Lady of Justice, you placed the nāgas on the path of enlightenment.
text.en-trans: dhar min dra zhé lu nam changchub kö

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: In your emanation as an asura princess,
text.en-trans: lhamin semor trulpé pungtsok kün

text.en: You tamed the hordes of jealous asuras.
text.en-trans: dukpé trakdok tulwé kunzang mor

text.en: Known as Samantabhadrī, All-Perfect Lady, you ripened the demon asuras and assured their liberation.
text.en-trans: drak té lhamin dü tsok mindrol kö

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Before Buddha Kāśyapa, you attained supreme awakening.
text.en-trans: ösung drung du changchub chok nyepa

text.en: Emanating as Śrī Sāgarā, Glorious Ocean—daughter of King Sukhapāla, Protector of Bliss—
text.en-trans: gyalpo dekyong semor pal tsor trul

text.en: You brought hundreds of thousands of nuns to perfect awakening.
text.en-trans: gelongma ni bumtrak dzok jang tob

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: At the time of Buddha Śākyamuni’s teachings, you manifested twenty-five emanations;
text.en-trans: shakya tubten par trulpa nyishu nga

text.en: Your re-emanations were inconceivable, defying the imagination.
text.en-trans: dé lé yangtrul sam mi khyabpar dzé

text.en: You flung wide every door to the Secret Mantra’s path of liberation.
text.en-trans: sang ngak tekpé drollam go kün ché

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Then, from the western buddhafield, Sukhāvatī, realm of great bliss,
text.en-trans: dené nubchok dechen zhingkham né

text.en: You emanated Secret Mantra teachers by the trillion.
text.en-trans: sang ngak tönpa jewa trak bum trul

text.en: And to accompany each of these you sent your ḍākinī emanations.
text.en-trans: dé dang nyampé khandrö ku ré trul

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: From the five places of Pāṇḍarāvasinī, supreme consort of Amitāyus,
text.en-trans: tsé pak yum chok gö kar né ngé ö

text.en: Light flooded the pure realms as the fivefold form of Dhātviśvarī, Queen of Space.
text.en-trans: zhingkham kün trö yingchuk rik ngé trul

text.en: Blessings in the form of the syllable hrīḥ streamed into the country of Zahor.
text.en-trans: jinlab hrih yik zahor yul du trö

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Your father and mother had marvelous dreams,
text.en-trans: yabyum zik nang milam ngotsar té

text.en: And incredibly—in the year of the male wood-horse, on the tenth of the month—
text.en-trans: sam mi khyabpa shing po ta da yi

text.en: You were born reciting the alphabet.
text.en-trans: tsé chur ku trung zhal né yangsal drok

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: As soon as you took birth, you prostrated to your kind parents.
text.en-trans: trung ma tak né yabyum drin chaktsal

text.en: You sang sweet songs, bringing joy to everyone gathered there.
text.en-trans: nyenpé lu yi khorwar gyepar kyé

text.en: The gods came to bathe you, and your fame resounded throughout the world.
text.en-trans: lha yi trü sol nyenpé jikten khyab

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: You saw the sufferings of birth, old age, sickness, and death.
text.en-trans: kyé ga na chi dukngal zikpa yi

text.en: Intense weariness arose in you, and your mind turned from saṃsāra.
text.en-trans: kyoshé drakpö khorwar lo dok té

text.en: You excelled in your studies of the five sciences and the sacred Dharma.
text.en-trans: damchö rigpé né ngar khepar jang

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: As foretold by the prophecies of Ācārya Vimala and Vajravārāhī,
text.en-trans: lobpön drimé pak mö lungten zhin

text.en: You debated with the tīrthika named Gautama, Refuter of All5.
text.en-trans: go ta ma yi mutek khyab sal du

text.en: Soundly you defeated him and your other opponents.
text.en-trans: tsöpa drenpé mutek golwa chom

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: In Zahor, you led three hundred women to the Dharma,
text.en-trans: zahor bumo sumgya chö la kul

text.en: You dispelled the suffering of the king and queen at the death of Prince Śrīsena,
text.en-trans: pal dé tsedé yabyum dukngal sal

text.en: And you found Brahmin flesh—which you kept as a sacred substance.
text.en-trans: dramzé sha nyé ten gyi tsowor zung

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: You reconciled the warring factions in Vedalī and Zahor.
text.en-trans: bé ta zahor trukpa tab kyi dum

text.en: You established the people in the Dharma, as Pāṇḍarāvasinī had predicted.
text.en-trans: gö kar lungten khoryok chö la tsü

text.en: Weary of saṃsāra, you made prayers and aspirations.
text.en-trans: khorwar kyowé tukkyé mönlam tab

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: When discussing with your father the requests for your hand in marriage,
text.en-trans: chok kyi nyemo long té yab dang drö

text.en: You had already abandoned saṃsāra, and you received a prophecy from Vajrasattva.
text.en-trans: khorwar mi chak dorsem lungten tob

text.en: With great skill you escaped and took ordination from the abbot Śāntarakṣita.
text.en-trans: tab kyi drö té khenpor rabtu jung

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: You became learned in the Dharma of sūtra and, with five hundred attendants,
text.en-trans: do chö kün jang kholmo ngabgya ché

text.en: You expounded the tripiṭaka within the confines of a nunnery.
text.en-trans: kün ga rawar denö ché pel dzé

text.en: You then received blessings and prophecies from Padmākara.
text.en-trans: pejung trulpé jinlab lungten tob

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Out among the flowers, you met the master of Uḍḍiyāna.
text.en-trans: kyo sang jönpé orgyen ngö dang jal

text.en: Leading him to his throne, you requested the Dharma.
text.en-trans: dendrang chö zhü tsé nawa dzi tong

text.en: A cowherd noticed, and slander began to spread,And the king took action to have the two of you punished.
text.en-trans: kurdeb la yok gyalpö chepa pok

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: They tried to burn Padmākara alive, but he thwarted them with miracles.
text.en-trans: pejung sön sek zhü kyang dzutrul ten

text.en: Ashamed and sad, king and ministers repented,And the Guru was invited to live with the king and queen.
text.en-trans: gyal lön nonggyö yabyum lhenchik zhuk

text.en: Then, the king offered his daughter to the Master of Uḍḍiyāna.
text.en-trans: yab kyi orgyen lhacham pulwar dzé

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: The men of Zahor became followers of Uḍḍiyāna’s master,
text.en-trans: zahor gyalkham po nam orgyen kor

text.en: And Mandāravā taught the Dharma to the women.
text.en-trans: mo nam lhacham chö ten tamché drol

text.en: Thus all gained liberation—and you, through the Master’s instructions, reached perfect maturity.
text.en-trans: lobpön dampé lhacham rabtu min

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: You saw the signs that told you to escape and practice the Dharma,
text.en-trans: chö drö da chö tong né pejung dang

text.en: And together with Padmākara you left for Māratika Cave.
text.en-trans: lhenchik drakpuk ma ra tikar jön

text.en: There you accomplished immortality, vidyādhara mastery over life.
text.en-trans: chimé tsé yi rigdzin ngön du drub

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: In Kotala, you tamed beings by miraculous means,
text.en-trans: ko tala yul dzutrul tab kyi tul

text.en: Victorious, curtailing the powers of heretic teachers.
text.en-trans: mutek tönpé tu lerab tu gyal

text.en: In the Pārijāta grove you bound hordes of obstructors.
text.en-trans: yongdü tsal du gek tsok dam la zhak

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: In line with Padmākara’s prophecy, you left for the mountains of Cāmara.
text.en-trans: pejung lungten ko'u ma ri la jön

text.en: There you led all the male and female demons to the Dharma.
text.en-trans: sinpo pomo tamché chö la kö

text.en: Each attained rainbow body, and the land was left empty.
text.en-trans: jalü drub té yul kham tongpar gyur

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: In the Eight Great Places such as the Great Awe-Inspiring Grove,
text.en-trans: ngampa tsal chen lasok yul chen gyé

text.en: And in the Eight Lesser Lands such as the one renowned as Kīla,
text.en-trans: ki la drok sok yul chung gyé nam su

text.en: You revealed your miraculous emanations – eight major and eight minor.
text.en-trans: ku yi dzutrul ché gyé chung gyé ten

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Then, together with Guru Padmākara, you traveled to the land of Uḍḍiyāna,
text.en-trans: dené pejung yabyum lhenchik tu

text.en: Crushing those of wrong view through skillful means.
text.en-trans: orgyen yul jön lokta tab kyi nub

text.en: You turned the wheel of Dharma, and all without exception were liberated into rainbow body.
text.en-trans: chökhor korwé lhakmé ja kur drol

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Following the Guru’s prophecy you traveled to Śambhala,
text.en-trans: gurü lungten sham bha la ru jön

text.en: Taming the beings of the twenty-five lands solely through miracles.
text.en-trans: ling chen nyernga dzutrul khoné tul

text.en: In this way, fortunate beings—one million and three hundred thousand—were liberated into rainbow body.
text.en-trans: kalden bumtrak chusum ja kur drol

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Next, you left for Bhejé, to Slate Rock mountain peak,
text.en-trans: dené bhé jé ya ri tsemor jön

text.en: Where the remaining instructions in their entirety were bestowed to perfection.
text.en-trans: dampa lhakma malü dzokpar nang

text.en: Then, in Nepal and Tibet, you came as a red-white utpala flower.
text.en-trans: trulpé utpal kar mar bal bö trö

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Your rainbow body dissolved without remainder into the expanse of space.
text.en-trans: lhakmé ja kur namkhé long du yal

text.en: You departed to Padmavyūhā, Lotus Array
text.en-trans: womin pemo kö du rab shek né

text.en: Where you became the supreme consort, Guhyajñānā, Secret Wisdom.
text.en-trans: yum chok sangwa yeshe ku ru gyur

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Together with nine hundred followers—all awareness-holders—
text.en-trans: lob bang rigdzin gugya lhenchik tu

text.en: You dissolved into rainbow body and sent emanations to benefit beings.
text.en-trans: ja kur tim né trulpé dönjé gyur

text.en: Thus,your ḍākinī emanations go on endlessly, taming beings.
text.en-trans: gang dul khandrö trulpa gyün ma ché

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: In Sukhāvatī, you are Pāṇḍarāvasinī, the secret wisdom consort.
text.en-trans: dewachen du gö kar sang yé yum

text.en: In Khecarī, you are Nāṭyeśvarī, the renowned Lady of Dance.
text.en-trans: khachö né su gar gyi wangmor drak

text.en: In the country of Zahor, your name is White Conch Medicine.
text.en-trans: zahor yul du dung men karmo zhé

text.en: Mandāravā, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: man dha ra wé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: May I and all others, throughout all our lifetimes,
text.en-trans: dak sok kyé dang tserab tamché du

text.en: Never be apart from you, Ḍākinī and Supreme Mother!
text.en-trans: yum chok dakki khyö dang mindral zhing

text.en: Liberated from all fears, both temporary and ultimate,
text.en-trans: nekab tartuk jikpa kün drol té

text.en: Thus shall we attain complete liberation and awakening!
text.en-trans: namtar drub né ngön sangyé par dzö

text.en: Bless us, that all misfortunes and obstacles are pacified!
text.en-trans: mitün kün zhi barché malü zhi

text.en: Bless us, that all our wishes be quickly fulfilled!
text.en-trans: samdön nyur drub zhendön tarchin né

text.en: Others’ benefit accomplished, may saṃsāra be emptied!
text.en-trans: khorwé né tong gyalyum gopang la

text.en: Through your blessing, may we all accomplish the Victorious Mother!
text.en-trans: göpé tu nü drubpar jingyi lob
